overview: Ms. Greta Guggenheim is the President of Ladder Capital Finance. Ms. Guggenheim has worked for Mr. Harris since 1995, and most recently, prior to helping form Ladder Capital Finance, at UBS and Dillon Read Capital Management from 2002 through 2007 as a Managing Director and the Head of Investments and Originations. Ms. Guggenheim was consistently one of the top producers at UBS, sourcing and managing the underwriting of proprietary real estate investments.

degrees.institution: The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania
